# Introduction

This package provides annotation data for the *Heterorhabditis bacteriophora* organism. It includes gene information, functional annotations, and mappings to various biological databases, derived from the NCBI gene information system.

```r
# Installation
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("org.Hbacteriophora.eg")
```

```r
#Loading the Package
library(org.Hbacteriophora.eg.db)
```

```r
#Accessing Gene Information
columns(org.Hbacteriophora.eg.db)  # List available fields
keys <- head(keys(org.Hbacteriophora.eg.db, keytype="ENTREZID"))  # Get sample gene IDs
select(org.Hbacteriophora.eg.db, keys=keys, columns=c("GENENAME", "SYMBOL"), keytype="ENTREZID")
```

```r
#Querying GO Terms
select(org.Hbacteriophora.eg.db, keys=keys, columns=c("GO", "ONTOLOGY"), keytype="ENTREZID")
```

Reference:

NCBI: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/
